docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Inner-city women at high risk of AIDS infection are now well-informed of their risk, but few are changing their behavior as a result, according to experts here for a federally sponsored conference on AIDS and women.

headline.main: Experts Say Women at Risk Are Well-Informed on AIDS

docs.snippet: LEAD: Inner-city women at high risk of AIDS infection are now well-informed of their risk, but few are changing their behavior as a result, according to experts here for a federally sponsored conference on AIDS and women.

byline.original: By GINA KOLATA, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TENS of thousands of people here and abroad are taking nutrient supplements in unusual experiments that, if successful, would usher in a new era in the war against cancer: chemoprevention.

headline.main: The Effort To Prevent Cancer Moves To New Stage

docs.snippet: LEAD: TENS of thousands of people here and abroad are taking nutrient supplements in unusual experiments that, if successful, would usher in a new era in the war against cancer: chemoprevention.
